archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0959
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Payments specialist, I want to ensure there is support for any tools that are built to manage payments so that we get quick and efficient turn around times on potential issues

properties.value: Comarch will store information about each payment loaded into system. So that it will allow to get details about all loaded and matched/unmatched payment. Can you please elabore what kind of data Comarch will need to expose to payment management tool?

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
